CustomField.description:
The level of support the customer receives either due to customer characteristics or negotiated agreement:
1: Slack channel + CSM 2: CSM 3: General Support (default)
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
The level of support the customer receives either due to customer characteristics or negotiated agreement:
1: Slack channel + CSM 2: CSM 3: General Support (default)
CustomField.label: Customer Success Tier
